div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2203 Palma di Montechiaro, 20 km. SE of Agriento, 1954? Burial: c. 275-270 B.C. (K) Contents: c. 77 AE Acragas: 27 (as Gabrici, Monetazione, pl. 6, 5 [17]; Phintias [10]) Syracuse: 44 (Agathocles as G. pl. 5, 12 [5]; 14 [30]; Hicetas as G. pl. 5, 13 [1]; Pyrrhus as G. pl. 5, 15 [8]) Unc.: 6 Disposition: Agrigento Miro, AIIN 1955, p. 95
